title: CY60111: Advanced Stereochemistry - Quick Facts
text:
CY60111
Course name | Advanced Stereochemistry
Offered by | Chemistry
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: nPrerequisite : NilMolecular Symmetry: Axial, Planar Chirality and Helicity, Topicity and Prostereoisomerism, Conformations of Cyclic Systems: Fused Ring and Bridged Ring Compounds. Dynamic Stereochemistry: Curtin Hammett Principle, Reduction of Cyclic Ketones, Felkin and Cieplak Model; Chiroptical Properties: Applications of ORD and CD; Molecular Recognition: chemical and stereochemical aspects.Book: D. Nasipuri, Stereochemistry of Organic Compounds: Principles, and Applications; E. L. Eliel, Stereochemistry of Organic Compounds.
